The Robertson Media Center offers consultations to faculty, staff, and students, classroom support for educators, and tutorials for use of specialty equipment and software. Remember to check the Library calendar for workshop sessions too!

  • Jump to:
  • Required Equipment Training
  •  | 
  • Self-Guided Training

Required Equipment Training

Yes, Yes, without the oops! Just my luck, no ice. Checkmate... Checkmate... Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? This thing comes fully loaded. AM/FM radio, reclining bucket seats, and... power windows. Is this my espresso machine? Wh-what is-h-how did you get my espresso machine?

Learn more

Hey, you know how I’m, like, always trying to save the planet? Here’s my chance. Hey, take a look at the earthlings. Goodbye! What do they got in there? King Kong? Did he just throw my cat out of the window? Must go faster. Yeah, but your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn’t stop to think if they should.

Learn more

Do you have any idea how long it takes those cups to decompose. Must go faster... go, go, go, go, go! What do they got in there? King Kong? Life finds a way. Checkmate... You really think you can fly that thing? Do you have any idea how long it takes those cups to decompose.
